pages.text: $(li)Detector Rails are a variant of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/rail)Rail$(/l).$(br)$(li)This kind of Rail works as $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/wood_pressure_plates)Pressure Plate$(/l), but only for $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecarts$(/l).
$(li)When a Minecart is located on a Detector Rail, this one will emit a redstone signal to near blocks.
